languages.text:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in round, the wearer immediately gains an extra turn with 3 MP and 0 AP.
The wearer does not provoke attacks of opportunity during this turn.

Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text:
每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，每当有敌人首次移动到装备者附近格子时，装备者会立即获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与0点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
装备者在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，每当有敌人首次移动到装备者附近格子时，装备者会立即获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与0点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
装备者在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
Когда в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} на соседней клетке оказывается противник, персонаж немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
Движение во время этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Когда в первый раз за раунд на соседней клетке оказывается противник, персонаж немедленно получает дополнительный ход с 3 ОП и 0 ОД.
Движение во время этого хода не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

Когда в первый раз за раунд на соседней клетке оказывается противник, персонаж немедленно получает дополнительный ход с 3 ОП и 0 ОД.
Движение во время этого хода не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中、敵が初めて使用者に隣接するセルに移動すると、使用者は直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が3と{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が0の{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。
languages.original_text:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中、敵が初めて使用者に隣接するセルに移動するたびに、使用者は直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が3と{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が0の{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。

languages.text:
Cada vez que un enemigo se mueve a una casilla adyacente al portador por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el portador obtiene inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
El portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que un enemigo se mueve a una casilla adyacente al portador por primera vez en una {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}, el portador obtiene inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno adicional{/g} con 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
El portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text:
Wenn sich ein Feind zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} auf ein an den Träger angrenzendes Feld bewegt, erhält der Träger sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Der Träger provoziert in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn sich ein Feind zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} auf eine an den Träger angrenzende Zelle bewegt, erhält der Träger sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}zusätzlichen Zug{/g} mit 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Der Träger provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}.

languages.text:
Lorsqu'un ennemi se déplace sur une case adjacente à celle de l'utilisateur pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
L'utilisateur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

L'utilisateur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text:
Bir düşman o {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez giyen kişinin bitişiğindeki bir hücreye hareket ettiğinde giyen kişi, anında 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır.
Giyen kişi, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} esnasında {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
